snippet: The Food Bank for New York City runs 68 sites that offer free tax preparation to those who qualify. Last year it helped filers claim $81.2 million in credits and refunds.
abstract: Food Bank for New York City, the largest supplier to soup kitchens and food pantries in the city, runs a network of 68 tax preparation sites on the side; in 2013 alone, the Food Bank helped with the filing of 48,110 returns claiming $81.2 million in tax credits and refunds, for city residents who can least afford to lose them.
lead_paragraph: The Food Bank for New York City runs 68 sites that offer free tax preparation to those who qualify. Last year it helped filers claim $81.2 million in credits and refunds.

headline.main: Food Bank’s Tax Service Puts Money in the Hands of Those in Need
